summary: SummaryHighlightsVeganCeraVe PM Facial Moisturizing Lotion for All Skin Types is an oil-free night face moisturizer formulated with 3 essential ceramides to help restore the skin barrier.
details: DetailsBenefitsUltra-lightweight oil-free night cream formula moisturizes the skin while you sleepHelps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramidesIdeal for normal to oily skinGentle, non-irritating formulaNon-comedogenic and won't clog pores or cause acne flare-upDeveloped with dermatologistsTravel Size, under TSA liquid limitKey IngredientsHyaluronic acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moistureNiacinamide: Helps calm skinCeramides: Essential for healthy skin, Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and help restore skin's natural barrier, helping to lock in moisture and keep harmful elements outMVE® Delivery Technology: Controlled release for all night hydrationFormulated WithoutFragranceOilParabensItem 2254422How To UseApply liberally to face and neck at night, or as directed bya physician.Build your Everyday Routine with CeraVe:Cleanse: Salicylic Acid Cleanser: Cleanses, hydrates and helps restore the protective skin barrierTreat: Skin Renewing Nightly Exfoliating Treatment: Exfoliates to help smooth fine lines and reveal radiant skin, without flakingMoisturize: **PM Facial Moisturizing Lotion:**Moisturizes throughout the night and helps restore the protective skin barrierIngredientsPurified Water, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglycerides, Niacinamide, Behentrimonium Methosulfate and Cetearyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-20 and Cetearyl Alcohol, Ceramide 3, Ceramide 6-II, Ceramide 1, Phytosphingosine, Hyaluronic Acid, Cholesterol, Dimethicone, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Potassium Phosphate, Dipotassium Phosphate, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Disodium EDTA, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum.
how_to_use: Apply liberally to face and neck at night, or as directed bya physician.Build your Everyday Routine with CeraVe:Cleanse: Salicylic Acid Cleanser: Cleanses, hydrates and helps restore the protective skin barrierTreat: Skin Renewing Nightly Exfoliating Treatment: Exfoliates to help smooth fine lines and reveal radiant skin, without flakingMoisturize: **PM Facial Moisturizing Lotion:**Moisturizes throughout the night and helps restore the protective skin barrier

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I love this moisturizer. And that it does not clog your pores. I will buy it again.

reviews.headline: Used for NINE YEARS!
reviews.comments: I've always been one of those people to get compliments on my skin. The moment I reached puberty was the moment I became a skin care customer. As soon as I tried this bottle of magic it was love at first site. Been using it since, I was 15 now I'm 23.. only downfall is they don't come in larger bottles!

reviews.headline: Fantastic PM Moisturizer
reviews.comments: This is the first time I've purchased a PM Moisturizer & I'm really happy I went with this brand! It's not heavy on your face & it doesn't leave your face greasy, like I feared it might!

reviews.headline: Great for acne prone skin.
reviews.comments: I've been repurchasing for over 2 years. I love it.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: My dermatologist recommended it.

reviews.headline: Great Product & Great Price
reviews.comments: I've tried several expensive products in the past, but after experiencing this one, I've changed my mind. It's incredibly lightweight on my skin and feels amazing. I wholeheartedly recommend it to my daughter and friends. I am truly impressed with this product and will undoubtedly be purchasing it again.

reviews.headline: Holy grail product
reviews.comments: I've been using CeraVe's AM and PM moisturizers since my mid-20s and they have never failed me. I'm currently 33 and get told all the time I look a decade younger. The PM moisturizer is lightweight, keeps my face hydrated and not greasy feeling, and absorbs well; I use 2, rarely 3, pumps and have plenty of product. A little goes a long way. Can't recommend CeraVe enough!

reviews.headline: CeraVe - Love -Love - Love it!
reviews.comments: My Dermatologist recommended this line of products years ago, and I always come back to the PM Moisturizer for day and night.  It is reasonable, depending where you purchase it, and a fabulous product.  I am 79 and no wrinkles!

reviews.headline: Perfect for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: My skin was breaking out and really angry after moving to a new climate- red, acne, burning, flaky and oily at the same time. I had to stop using my expensive products and switched to this. It immediately calmed my skin & irritation. I will be switching my skin care to this brand as it is oil & fragrance free and works on my sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Checks All My Boxes
reviews.comments: Great price. If you use 2-3 pumps worth of this product on your face and neck, this night cream will last probably 3 months max. That's a pretty good deal, especially since you're getting more product than other night creams that are more expensive. This night cream leaves my skin feeling hydrated.

reviews.headline: is you want glassy/glowy skin, use this!!
reviews.comments: this stuff makes my skin look so fresh and glowy. I tried using other moisterizers and they would look good at first, but soon after my skin would look so dull. This moisterizer makes it look glowy for most of the day!

reviews.headline: Not for cystic acne
reviews.comments: I have very acne, prone, sensitive skin, and this did nothing but make my acne worse. I know everybody goes through a purging stage, but it made my skin so itchy and my acne so much more inflamed than it usually is.

reviews.headline: New formula?
reviews.comments: I have used this product in the past and never had any issuse i recently bought a new bottle in Feb 2025 and noticed a slight tingling at first. Now, its been maybe 3-4 days of using it at night and i have chemical burns on my chin & it is severely dry and irritated in that area. This is the only thing i have changed recently to my skin regimen.

reviews.headline: New formula?
reviews.comments: I have used this product in the past and never had any issuse i recently bought a new bottle in Feb 2025 and noticed a slight tingling at first. Now, its been maybe 3-4 days of using it at night and i have chemical burns on my chin & it is severely dry and irritated in that area. This is the only thing i have changed recently to my skin regimen.

reviews.headline: I like this product
reviews.comments: I love this moisturizer and have been using it for years.  It is a little too lightweight for my skin as mine is dry, but I mix a little bit of this in with my vanicream because vanicream on its own is too thick for me.  A little bit of both is perf

reviews.headline: yes yes yes!!!
reviews.comments: I've used this product for a couple years now and it's very good for my skin. I also use the cerave face wash before I put it on and it is perfect. I recommend for people trying to find a simple yet effective skin care routine

reviews.headline: Not for Teen skin
reviews.comments: Not for teen skin. Causes breakouts. Too many ingredients in the product.

reviews.headline: Nice
reviews.comments: Its too heavy of a moisturizer for me personally, I could definitely feel it on my face all night.

reviews.headline: This is my go-to daytime moisturizer.
reviews.comments: My skin is super dry, so i love this as a lighter weight daytime moisturizer. It plays well under my sunscreen and foundation. It has excellent ingredients and feels smooth without being greasy. I know there are fancier moisturizers on the market, but this one has remained a favorite for years now.

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: Easy to use

faceoff_positive.comments:
I am getting older (mid 50's) and have always had dry skin.  This past year, it has become super dry, sensitive and the dry indoor heat during a Great Lakes winter has been brutal on my skin. The sensitivity was making it hard for me to find skincare products that worked and didn't make me feel like I needed to use a flame extinguisher(LOL the site won't let me use the word for flame!) on my face!  I was in Ulta and saw this. The label says it uses ingredients that are time released. The deciding factor was the spf 30 sunscreen in it. When the snow melts, we will be out on our bikes again and I need sunscreen! Spf 30 is the minimum amount you should use and most creams are spf 20.  Plus they feel funky on dry, sensitive skin.  
How does it work?  Well, it is different. Not greasy and not conventionally "emollient" but it does make my skin look and feel better. It is softer and more pliable.  I am starting to get wrinkly/crepey eyelids and I carefully put this on and let it absorb before applying primer/eyeshadow (besides all over my face).  It has really helped!  I quit wearing foundation and use tinted moisturizer or a BB cream and a cream blush.  Conventional creams are too slick for the makeup to stay on, but the CeraVe reduces the wrinkles, give me sunscreen and doesn't cause the makeup to slide right off.  At night a put it on and put a more emollient nightcream (budget friendly) over it for extra oomph.  In the last couple of weeks, I have had 2 people come up and say that I looked younger and thinner! I will take that all day long!  I have bought every kind of moisturizer-expensive, products from "parties", department stores and even used to use creamy petroleum jelly on my face and nothing has ever worked. I have even noticed that I look better and I am usually very critical.  I know this review is long, but if you have gone through what seems like every cream out there and end up giving it away like I have, you want honest, detailed opinions. I hope this helps!
faceoff_positive.headline: Healing AND SPF 30!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I use other Cerave products and love those, but this didn't work for me. I've been breaking out with hives, raised welts on my face. I couldn't figure out what it was. I thought maybe it was stress, but then it happened again when I was fine. My skin gets irritated and itchy too. I've had to later on hydrocortisone and take an allergy pill. After reading other reviews with the same reaction… it makes sense.
faceoff_negative.headline: Hives/Rash
